definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
revolving tray on a dining table/lazy Susan

sentences.english: The table was set for lunch, and the coffee was boiling on the black iron stove.
sentences.chinese: 午餐桌已备好，黑铁炉上正煮着咖啡。

sentences.english: It consists of a simmering metal pot of stock at the center of the dining table.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个金属罐酝酿的股票为中心的餐桌。

sentences.english: In China it is rare to see a knife on the dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，餐桌上放一把刀是极其少见的现象。

sentences.english: Excellent. Now what about tickets and table reservations ?
sentences.chinese: 平共处太好了。票和餐桌的预订情况怎样？

sentences.english: Delicate smoked salmon provides a heart-healthy element to your table.
sentences.chinese: 精致的熏三文鱼为您的餐桌增加有益心脏健康的元素。

sentences.english: If you wouldn't put it on the table, don't put it in the pot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你都不愿意把这酒摆上餐桌，那也别倒进锅里去。

sentences.english: It is also impolite to have your elbows on the dining table when you are eating.
sentences.chinese: 而且在用餐时把手肘放在餐桌上是不礼貌的行为。

sentences.english: When it comes to tipping, they just leave some money on the table.
sentences.chinese: 说到给小费，他们就把钱留到餐桌上。

sentences.english: The saint dinner table substituted for the sacrificial altar, choir's position has been ordinary is meeting audiences' right hand side.
sentences.chinese: 圣餐桌取代了祭坛，唱诗班的位置一般在会众的右首。

sentences.english: The raw fish disgusted me , so I left the table.
sentences.chinese: 生鱼让我感到恶心，所以我离开了餐桌。

sentences.english: It is impolite to burp at the table.
sentences.chinese: 在餐桌上打嗝是很不礼貌的。

sentences.english: He splashed the soup on the table.
" He reached across the table and took her hand in his own suddenly, squeezing it.
sentences.chinese: 他突然靠向餐桌捉住了丽的手，握在了自己的手中。

sentences.english: In dining-room, gong Zong's lubricious table, be helpful for stomachic .
sentences.chinese: 餐厅里，红棕色的餐桌，有利于增进食欲。

sentences.english: She always clears away quickly when we have finished eating.
sentences.chinese: 我们一吃完饭，她总是很快就收拾好餐桌。

sentences.english: She glanced about the table to see the effect of this.
sentences.chinese: 她环顾一眼餐桌，看这句话产生了什么效果。

definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
